body: Hi Burin, Chris will get back to you on this soon. It looks like a bug to me. The report is printing a different value than the effective ventilation area. I added an issue on github ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/301](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/301)) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/EFRV*I*wRwIejKFJlgZjOrqqXYbJHF0luUwgrj-E0QuMFm*JckRhu3qlTwW-Nb4FsMTrhCuixX2GORn7RhLr8GiYYGyXh3-J/natVentBug.PNG) As always thank you so much for double checking and reporting the issues! Highly appreciated. Mostapha PS: @Chris- I have no idea why images that upload look like this but I hope it shows where the issue is!
